segments.text: The Mountains would be a great place for the company retreat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have chosen January as the month for this retreat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: January is a little too close to the Christmas holidays .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , maybe another choice might be better .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that April would work . Spring is a lovely time to be in the mountains .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for thinking of that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe if we asked around we could see what people would prefer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll take care of taking the survey and get back to you with the answers .
segments.speaker: S2
